xades4j.production
Class DataObjectReference

java.lang.Object
  xades4j.properties.DataObjectDesc
      xades4j.production.DataObjectReference

public final class DataObjectReference
extends DataObjectDesc

A reference to a signed data object. Each instance of this class will result in a ds:Reference element in the signature.

See Also:
DataObjectDesc, EnvelopedXmlObject

Constructor Summary
DataObjectReference(java.lang.String uri)
          Creates a new data object reference.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class xades4j.properties.DataObjectDesc
getSignedDataObjProps, getTransforms, getUnsignedDataObjProps, hasProperties, withCommitmentType, withDataObjectFormat, withDataObjectTimeStamp, withDataObjectTimeStamp, withOtherDataObjectProperty, withOtherDataObjectProperty, withTransform
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

DataObjectReference

public DataObjectReference(java.lang.String uri)
Creates a new data object reference. Additional information is added through the different methods in DataObjectDesc.

Parameters:
uri - the URI that identifies the target data object
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if uri is null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if uri is not RFC 2396 compliant
